title: Draw Weapon Fight Party
description: In Draw Weapon - Fight Party, you can draw your own weapons. Feel free to write your weapon, but keep an eye on the amount of ink left. Your creativity determines your combat style. Enter the 3D battle arena and fight against other opponents in an action-packed showdown. Draw precisely, craft the ultimate weapon, and crush your opponents to become the ultimate warrior.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mahjong Connect Majong Class
description: Mahjong Connect is a classic elimination-style casual game where players need to find and connect identical mahjong tiles on the board. The game rules are simple yet challenging, suitable for players of all ages.
instructions: - Multiple mahjong tiles are distributed on the game interface - Players need to find two identical mahjong tiles to connect

title: Fashion Famous
description: Step into the stylish universe of Fashion Famous! Compete in glamorous fashion contests, pick outfits that match each round’s theme, and impress the judges to earn high scores. Travel across global fashion capitals and showcase your look on dazzling runways. Explore makeup, hairstyles, and accessories to build the perfect outfit. Will your sense of style stand out among players from all around the world?
instructions: WASD / Arrow Keys: Move Mouse Click: Select clothes and interact with UI

title: Agents io
description: Play Agents.io online! Eliminate other agents, grow your team, and dominate the arena in this free game. Agents.io is a multiplayer action game where you control a lone agent and battle against others in an open arena. As you eliminate enemies, they join your team, allowing you to grow your squad and become stronger. The more agents you collect, the easier it is to dominate your opponents. Use smart tactics, avoid bigger squads, and climb to the top of the leaderboard!
instructions: Mouse Move / WASD – Move agent

title: Italian Brainrot Jigsaw
description: Italian Brainrot Jigsaw is a funny puzzle game with the most popular meme characters. You can select one of the fifteen images and then select one of the four modes (16, 36, 64 and 100 pieces). Select your favorite picture and complete the jigsaw in the shortest time possible! Have fun and enjoy!
instructions: Use mouse or touch on the screen to solve the puzzle!

title: SORTSTORE
description: Swap products to match three of the same kind and fulfill customer requests. Products can be moved to empty shelves, and items in the back will move forward when the front ones are removed. Each move decreases the number of moves left, and the game ends when the move count reaches 0.
instructions: Tap a product to pick it up, then tap an empty shelf to place it.

title: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run
description: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run is a stylish dress-up game where you join glamorous catwalk competitions. Pick the perfect outfit, match accessories, style your hair, and impress the judges. Travel to fashion shows around the world, earn points, unlock outfits, and become a global trendsetter. Win challenges to climb the leaderboard and prove your fashion sense. Every level brings a new style theme to conquer!
instructions: Use MOUSE and LEFT-CLICK to apply dresses on your character between the options during the walk.

title: Get To The Chopper
description: Gear up and fight your way to safety in Get To The Chopper, a thrilling 3D first-person shooter where every mission is a battle for survival! Your objective is clear: reach the extraction chopper while eliminating all enemies standing in your way. Armed with a fully customizable loadout—including a primary gun, secondary weapon, grenades, and a melee weapon—you’ll face waves of enemies across dynamic battlefields such as forests, deserts, and more.
instructions: Blast through enemies and fight your way to the extraction point in this intense 3D first-person shooter!

title: Klondike Solitaire
description: Test your skill and logic with Klondike, the classic solitaire game loved by generations! Stack the cards in ascending order, alternating colors, and complete all four suits to win the game. With clean graphics, intuitive controls, and the option to play with one or three cards, Klondike offers hours of fun and relaxation. Perfect for a quick break or a long strategic challenge!
instructions: Stack the cards in ascending order, alternating colors, and complete all four suits

title: Fruit Mahjong 3D
description: Fruit Mahjong 3D is a relaxing puzzle game where you match pairs of fruit-themed tiles in 3D space. Rotate the view, find free tiles, and clear the board by matching identical pieces. Each level is handcrafted and fully solvable, offering a mix of easy and challenging layouts. The game starts with a short tutorial and gradually increases in difficulty. Use shuffle and hint buttons if you get stuck. Enjoy colorful graphics, smooth animations, and intuitive controls on both mobile and desktop.
instructions: Find and match two tiles with the same fruit-themed image. Tiles can only be matched if they’re not blocked by others. If you need help, use the ‘Hint’ and ‘Shuffle’ buttons.

title: Italian Brainrot: Puzzle & Battle
description: You have many parts of the same picture. Drag and drop the parts and assemble the character picture. A game about Italian animal characters. Each level is a new character. Unlock them all!
instructions: Drag and drop pieces of the picture from the bottom to assemble the whole picture. Insert the pieces in the correct place.

title: Ballistic Breakthrough
description: explore lush scenes, tackle tricky obstacles, and unlock upgrades. Every level blends fun challenges with strategic boosts
instructions: Swipe to control the turret and shoot—break obstacles

title: Candy Pop Mania
description: Dive into the enchanting world of matching games - Candy Pop Mania - where delightful fun and challenging games await! Pop, blast and match 3 sweets to keep on the adventure! Use combos and reach the best results! Challenge yourself to win all of the levels of Candy Pop Mania!
instructions: - Swipe tiles horizontally or vertically to create a line of three or more matching items. - Matches of four or more create special tiles with unique abilities. - Use power-ups to help clear difficult parts of the board. - Complete levels to earn rewards.

title: Shoot N Crush
description: Unleash your shooting skills and break bricks in Shoot N Crush. This game is the best choice for your leisure time. Your goal is to shoot with precision and flexibility. Use the bouncing ball to smash a solid brick with precision. Each level has a different objective and difficulty, you need to break these bricks in the smartest way possible.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Resident Evil: Purge Operation
description: At the start of each level, players must quickly locate powerful weapons like the shotgun and sniper rifle, crucial for fending off hordes of zombies. Once the eerie alarm sounds, grotesque, ferocious undead flood the area. A single mistake can lead to being swarmed, so precise marksmanship, agile movement, and calm judgment are essential for survival.
instructions: move：W A S D jump: SPACE fire: MOUSE 1 aim: MOUSE 2 roll: X reload: R interact: F crouch: C

title: Sprunki Space Challenge
description: Get ready to soar through the stars in Sprunki Space Challenge an intergalactic online adventure where brave kids take flight to save the galaxy. This wild space ride throws you into the cockpit of a zippy space rover where danger lurks in every asteroid and rocket burst. But worry not: Sprunki is here to lead the charge. It is all about timing, reflexes, and sky-high jumps that send you sailing straight into the action.
instructions: Arrow keys to move!

title: Tung Tung Sahur Coloring Book
description: Unleash your creativity with the Italian Tung Coloring Book, a hilarious and surreal coloring experience inspired by the viral Italian Brainrot meme phenomenon. Featuring absurd characters like Tung Tung Tung Sahur, Tralalero Tralala, and Bombardiro Crocodilo, this coloring book offers a unique blend of humor and art. Each page presents a bizarre and whimsical scene, inviting you to add your personal touch with colors.
instructions: Mouse Click

title: Ninja Spell Match
description: Ninja Spell Match is a fast-paced blend of match-3 puzzling and ninja action. Connect tiles to charge up your attacks and unleash devastating moves against waves of enemies. With each level, the challenge grows tougher as you fight your way through 30 unique stages packed with traps, puzzles, and rival ninjas. Think fast, match smart, and strike hard—your reflexes and strategy are the only way to survive.
instructions: Connect 3 or more tiles to attack, defense or recover. Destroy all enemy waves to advance to the next level.

title: Freecell Solitaire
description: Put your mind to the test with FreeCell, one of the most beloved solitaire card games of all time! Move cards between columns, use the free cells cleverly, and organize suits in ascending order to win. Elegant graphics, smooth animations, and intuitive controls make every game a relaxing and satisfying experience. Whether you're a solitaire veteran or a curious beginner, FreeCell will win you over with its perfect mix of simplicity and strategy.
instructions: The goal is to move all cards into the four final piles (one for each suit), arranging them from Ace to King. You can move cards between the eight columns, always in descending order and alternating colors (red/black). Use the 4 free cells on the left to temporarily park cards and plan more complex moves. The more empty cells and columns you have, the more cards you can move at once. Every game is solvable… if you can find the right combination of moves!

title: Serious Head 2
description: The adventures of a serious head continue. Portals open, monsters come out. Prepare for battle: rebuild your base and upgrade your weapons. Take your partners to help you and put up a decent resistance!
instructions: Build mode: 1- 6 keys = choose a building Left mouse button = confirm selection Right mouse button = cancel selection Mouse wheel = rotate R = delete mode Battle mode: WASD or arrow keys = move Left mouse button = shoot Right mouse button = iron sight Mouse wheel / 0-9 = change weapons Space = jump Z / X / C = ability

title: Candy Chain Master
description: Welcome to Candy Chain Master! The board has blue tiles with candies on them. Start by selecting a candy and move across nearby tiles with the same candy to make a chain of three or more. Each tile must turn golden by matching at least one candy on it. Think carefully and move fast to turn all tiles golden before time runs out.
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Wacky Wheels
description: ? Wacky Wheels – Drift, Dodge & Dominate! Master the chaos in Wacky Wheels, the ultimate test of timing and control! Navigate wild tracks, drift through tight turns, dodge massive hammers, and collect stars — all before the clock runs out. Each level brings new challenges, themes, and physics that’ll keep you on the edge of your seat. ? It’s not just a race — it’s a wacky adventure of skill and speed!
instructions: Arrow keys or W,S,A,D To control the car on PC and buttons for mobile control

title: DayCare Tycoon
description: Are you ready to build your dream business empire and be a great babysitter in this money tycoon simulator ? Dive into the world of daycare games and experience the joy of managing your own thriving idle tycoon games. From welcoming adorable babies to creating a safe and happy environment, this game offers everything you need to grow your daycare business into a successful venture.
instructions: Your daycare business awaits – download this money tycoon simulator today and let the fun begin, take care of a baby and become a rich babysitter in this daycare games !

title: Just Ludo
description: Just Ludo is a tabletop dice board game. Roll the dice and let your chess pieces reach the finish line first, so as to defeat the opponent and win rich rewards. Are you ready for the challenge?
instructions: Choose a mode, roll the dice, win!

title: Mahjong Connect Fish World
description: Mahjong Connect Fish World is a captivating puzzle game with an ocean theme. In this beautiful underwater world, players need to connect matching mahjong tiles to eliminate them, unlock levels, and explore a rich variety of marine creatures. The game combines traditional connect-style gameplay with an ocean theme, providing players with a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience.
instructions: Mouse & Touch

title: Candy Match Puzzle
description: Dive into a delightful puzzle experience with Candy Puzzle Match, where matching candies is all about tapping! Simply tap on groups of two or more adjacent candies of the same color to clear them from the board. The more candies you clear at once, the higher your score! Watch the board shift and cascade with every move as you complete deliciously fun objectives. With colorful visuals and satisfying chain reactions, this game is perfect for fans of casual and relaxing puzzle games.
instructions: Tap candies to clear!

title: Giant Wanted Monster
description: The city is being occupied by giant monsters. You, as an elite sniper, pick up your sniper gun. Defeat these crazy monsters and protect the survival of humanity. In Giant Wanted Monster, the fate of the city is at stake with every bullet. You need to use the powerful sniper weapon to shoot accurately from a distance and hit the monster's Achilles heel.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Super Slime
description: Super Slime is a fast-paced platformer where you take control of a squishy, bouncy hero on a mission to save the day. Master the art of stretching, bouncing, and dodging through 100 thrilling levels packed with tricky obstacles and fierce enemies. Precision and quick reflexes are your best allies in this adorable yet challenging adventure!
instructions: WASD or Arrow keys to move, you can also use the joystick on mobile

title: Tap Car
description: Unveil stunning car masterpieces by solving image puzzles. Every tap reveals more of the picture—can you uncover them all? A must-play for car enthusiasts and puzzle lovers alike! Would you like a few more variations depending on the tone you're aiming for (like more casual, exciting, or elegant)?
instructions: click to move the car

title: Jewel Dress Up
description: Each puzzle brings you closer to unlocking fabulous fashionable combinations. Use power-ups to overcome challenges and to express your style, all while enjoying a relaxing and engaging gameplay. Can you create the perfect look?
instructions: Match 3 or more jewels to clear them from the board and earn coins. Every three wins unlocks 3 outfit choices to dress up your character. Use your coins to buy new outfits and unlock additional characters as you progress.

title: Pirate Paradise
description: Pirate Paradise is a fun and relaxing game where you have to match three identical items in a row. Help the pirates sort the items into portals. The difficulty of the game will gradually increase and there will be more and more items.
instructions: Place objects on portals, connect three identical objects in a row to make them disappear. To complete the level, you need to free all portals from objects. On the computer: Drag objects with the left mouse button. On the phone: Drag objects with your finger.

title: Home Design - Match 3
description: Enjoy a perfect blend of home design and match-3 fun! Solve colorful puzzles, create your ideal home, and activate powerful boosters. Take on rewarding challenges, collect prizes, and personalize your interiors. Play anytime, anywhere!
instructions: - Match 3 or more items - Use boosters - Complete level objectives Just use your mouse or tap on the screen, and all the beauty will be revealed to you!

title: Cooking Cafe Food Chef
description: Prepare and cook delicious food from all over the world in Cooking Cafe Story. Build the cafe of your dreams while serving hot meals to hungry customers at a fast pace! Don't let the time run out, practice your time management skills, and experience the craze of real cooking! Dash from cafe's to restaurants and unlock many locations as your progress on your journey. This cooking game offers endless fun levels with challenging missions set up in each level to give you that special experience!
instructions: Manage your cafe by welcoming the customers and quickly taking their orders, win their hearts by simply tapping and serving them delicious meals right away!

title: Kawaii Claw Merge
description: The cutest merging adventure has arrived, featuring some of the most colorful Kawaii plushies around! Show off your merging skills by combining smaller Kawaii plushies to get a bigger plushy! Can you discover the biggest plushy of them all? Ready for a serious dose of cuteness? Play Kawaii Merge now - and let the merging magic begin!
instructions: Tap to drop the Kawaii plushy to merge with other similar Kawaii plushies to get a bigger Kawaii plushy. Merge all the way to get the biggest Kawaii plushy of them all!

title: Lovie Chics Spring Break Fashion
description: Lovie Chics Spring Break Fashion” is your ultimate destination for chic and trendy outfits perfect for the spring break season! Explore our curated collection of vibrant dresses, stylish swimwear, and must-have accessories designed to elevate your style and make a statement wherever you go. Whether you’re hitting the beach, lounging by the pool, or exploring new destinations, we have everything you need to look and feel fabulous all spring break long.
instructions: Left Mouse Button click

title: Cards Match Puzzle
description: Jump into Cards Match Puzzle, where matching cards is your ticket to addictive fun! Place cards on a grid to create killer combos—think 2-3-4 or four cards for massive points. Wild jokers shake things up, slipping into any sequence, while frozen cards dare you to crack them loose. Boost your score with dazzling multipliers and watch matches explode! Quick to learn, tough to master—can you rule the grid? Play now and match your way to glory!
instructions: Match 3 cards in a row or 4 of the same number to score.

title: Cubatoria Merge 2048
description: Welcome to the exciting world of Cubatoria Merge 2048! This game combines elements of the classic 2048 game with a three-dimensional visual design, which makes it unique and exciting. The game is designed for fans of puzzles, logic games and those who appreciate a creative approach to classic concepts. Cubatoria Merge 2048 promises an exciting immersion in virtual space with the opportunity to enjoy a new visual experience.
instructions: Pinch and move blocks of the same color and value and combine them. Throw blocks into the river to exchange them for coins and upgrade the power of the merge. If you want to make progress even faster, you can open the chest, which is unlocked

title: Helicopter Battle Steve 2 Player
description: Get on the helicopter and choose either the blue or red player. Destroy your friend’s helicopter to win the game.Winning is simple: just don’t let your helicopter crash! Jump and shoot to defeat your opponent. To beat the red or blue player, you must play your best. The player whose helicopter explodes the most will lose the game.
instructions: *To use the red helicopter, press the W key. *To use the blue helicopter, press the Up Arrow Key. *The first to reach 10 points wins.

title: Jump Man
description: A highly addictive endless jumper with a super cute but mischievous character! Chain combos and score as high as you can!
instructions: Chain combos and score as high as you can!

title: Zombie Terminator
description: Zombie Terminator is an exciting first-person shooter game where players take on the role of a survivor in a world overrun by a zombie outbreak. Players must survive and hunt zombies in this post-apocalyptic setting. The game attracts numerous players with its intense combat experience and rich weapon system.
instructions: mouse or touchscreen

title: Makeup Fruits
description: In Makeup Fruits, give your favorite fruits a stunning makeover! Apply makeup, add accessories, and create fabulous fruit beauty icons. Choose from a variety of makeup options, including powder, lipstick, and eyelashes. Take a "selfie" of your creation and share it with friends! Earn gems to unlock even more fun items and keep the transformation going!
instructions: Click to select the fruit you want to transform into a beauty icon, then proceed to choose and apply a variety of makeup options. Explore a diverse selection of brands, powder colors, eyelashes, lipsticks, stickers, and more!

title: Strike Force: Action Platformer
description: Step into the explosive world of Strike Force: Action Platformer — a high-octane, side-scrolling action shooter inspired by the legendary Contra series. Fight through thrilling levels packed with non-stop combat, deadly enemies, and intense boss battles. Wield an arsenal of powerful weapons including handguns, rocket launchers, shotguns, machine guns, and devastating grenades. Master your reflexes and tactical skills to survive waves of relentless enemies!
instructions: Mobile Controls: Left Side – Virtual joystick for movement Right Side – Buttons for: Jump, Shoot and Throw Grenade Desktop Controls: Movement – Use W / A / S / D or Arrow Keys Jump – Press Spacebar Shoot – Press J Throw Grenade – Press K

title: Zombie Derby Pixel Survival
description: Zombie Derby Pixel Survival has never before been the destruction of zombies so bright, dynamic and fun. Take a new look at the world of the zombie apocalypse. Never before has killing zombies been so vibrant, dynamic and fun.
instructions: On PC: D or → - Drive A or → - Brake W or ↑ - Forward tilt A or ↓ - Tilt back Space - Turbo acceleration

title: Food Merge
description: Food Merge is a game where you combine different foods to create delicious dishes and serve them to hungry customers. Merge ingredients quickly and strategically to before the time runs out! Each level brings new challenges, faster orders, and more complex combos. Can you keep up and become the ultimate food master?
instructions: Mobile compatible Everything is controller by mouse or touch

title: Space Raider
description: Blast your way through the galaxy in intense battles. Enjoy beautiful graphic and exciting gameplay with tons of enemies as customizable ships.
instructions: Press and Drag to move your spaceship

title: BMG: CrashDay 2025
description: The game "BMG: CrashDay 2025" is an arcade racing simulator that combines elements of action and realism. Players can choose from a variety of cars, each with its own unique characteristics and appearance. The game has various tracks, each with its own features, such as difficult turns, steep climbs and descents, as well as various obstacles.
instructions: Controls: WASD - Control the car. Shift - nitro. R - flip the car. C - change camera. Tab - call MENU. T - Slow down time. Space - handbrake. G - hook up a trailer Controls for mobile devices: Use the game interface on the screen.

title: Bank Robbery: Escape
description: Bank Robbery: Escape is an intense FPS game title in shooting category, where your mission is to bust your crew out of a heavily guarded police station. Navigate through relentless police raids, arm yourself with the best gear, and make your escape before time runs out—or face the consequences. Will you outsmart the law or go down in a blaze of glory?
instructions: WASD = move Left-click = shoot Right-click = iron sight Mouse wheel = change weapons Left-shift = run Space = jump E = interact

title: Superhero Transform Change Race
description: Are you ready to be a superhero and have a racing adventure? In Superhero Transform - Change Race,you should run and transform! In the challenging track, you will incarnate different superheroes. Use their special abilities to avoid obstacles and surpass opponents. Each transformation has a unique skill set. For example, you can become Spider-Man and climb rock. Turn into a shark and swim quickly to the next challenge; Turn into the Flash and sprint to the finish line, etc.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Truck Stack Colors
description: Get ready for an exciting challenge. Truck Stack Colors takes you into a wonderful world of parkour and truck stacking. In attractive levels, advance by stacking platforms that are the same color as the truck. To master the balancing and stacking skills to build amazing truck towers and climb even higher.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Bubble Game 3D
description: Get ready for bubble-popping fun in Bubble Game 3D, a super cool version of the original classic Bubble Shooter game, now with amazing 3D graphics. Aim, match, and pop colorful bubbles in a world that looks like it’s coming right out of the screen. This is Bubble Shooter 3D like you’ve never seen before!
instructions: Aim the arrow and click to shoot bubbles. Match three or more of the same color to pop them. Clear the board before the bubbles reach the bottom. Use wall bounces for tricky shots and plan a head for combos.
